about_the_game:
Princess of Seas is a sea sailing. Start the blue-colored adventure now.

Basic Features

  • Randomly Generated World: The world is procedurally generated. So the adventure in a completely new world every time.
  • Open-World: No limitation. Explore the world freely.
  • Trading: Selling goods all around the world and making money
  • Upgrading Ship: 197 ships in the world. Unlock them, buy them, and enhanced them. You can never be too powerful.
  • Hire Sailors: More than 300 sailors all over the world. Pick your desired sailor and build the team.
  • Sea Battle: Trace the pirate, defeat them (and make some money).

This game is still under development. More features are coming soon.

name: Princess of Seas

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: i7-4700HQ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 980GT
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7-4700HQ
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 Ti
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Princess of Seas is a sea sailing with Open-World, Sandbox, Quest, Explore, Sea Battle. Let's go and save this world.
